content.title: Decoration Color
content.tooltip: Color of the underline, overline, or line-through decoration.

content.title: Decoration Color
content.tooltip: Color of the underline, overline, or line-through decoration.

content.title: Decoration Thickness
content.tooltip: Thickness of the underline, overline, or line-through decoration.

content.title: Sync Link & Decoration Color (Link Classes)
content.tooltip: Link decoration color matches the link color when this option is on and you're using link utility classes.

content.title: Add Link Default Exclusions
content.tooltip: Turn this on if you need to remove default link styling from certain areas of your website.

content.title: Link Exclusions
content.tooltip: Wrap each selector in quotes and separate them with a comma. Example: "header a", "footer a"

content.title: Exclude '.btn--' Selectors
content.tooltip: Comma separated list of selectors to exclude from default button styling.
